body.de:
Willkommen auf Neodyme!
Wir hoffen, Sie genießen Ihren Besuch.
Dieser Server ist nicht mit Epic Games Inc. verbunden.

Добро пожаловать на Neodyme.
Мы надеемся, что вам понравится.
Этот сервер не связан с Epic Games Inc.

이 서버는 에픽게임즈와 관련이 없습니다.

Welcome to Neodyme!
We hope you enjoy your visit.
This server is not affiliated with Epic Games Inc.

Benvenuti su Neodyme!
Ci auguriamo che la vostra visita sia piacevole.
Questo server non è affiliato a Epic Games Inc.

Bienvenue sur le Neodyme !
Nous espérons que vous apprécierez votre visite.
Ce serveur n'est pas affilié à Epic Games Inc.

مرحبًا بك في خادم Neodyme!

このサーバーはEpic Games Inc.とは関係ありません。

message.title: The Survive the Storm event is now live!

body.de:
Nehmen Sie das Versprechen an:
Wählen Sie eine Zielüberlebenszeit von 3 oder 7 Nächten.

Senden Sie Feedback:
Survive the Storm befindet sich noch in der Entwicklung. Wir würden gerne hören, was du denkst.
body.ru:
Примите обещание:
Выберите целевое время выживания - 3 или 7 ночей.

Оставьте отзыв:
Survive the Storm все еще находится в разработке. Мы будем рады услышать ваше мнение.
body.ko:
서약하기 :
목표 생존 기간을 3일 또는 7일로 선택하세요.

피드백 보내기 :
서바이브 더 스톰은 아직 개발 중입니다. 여러분의 의견을 듣고 싶습니다.
body.en:
Take the pledge:
Select a target survival time of 3 or 7 nights.

Send Feedback:
Survive the Storm is still in development. We’d love to hear what you think.
body.it:
Prendi l'impegno:
Seleziona un obiettivo di sopravvivenza di 3 o 7 notti.
Invia un feedback:
Survive the Storm è ancora in fase di sviluppo. Ci piacerebbe sapere cosa ne pensate.
body.fr:
Faites un don:
Sélectionnez une durée de survie cible de 3 ou 7 nuits.
Envoyez vos commentaires:
Survive the Storm est encore en cours de développement. Nous aimerions savoir ce que vous en pensez.
body.es:
Comprométete:
Selecciona un objetivo de supervivencia de 3 o 7 noches.
Envía tus comentarios:
Sobrevive a la tormenta aún está en desarrollo. Nos encantaría conocer tu opinión.
body.ar:
خذ التعهد:
اختر وقت البقاء المستهدف 3 أو 7 ليالٍ.
إرسال التعليقات:
لا تزال لعبة ”النجاة من العاصفة“ قيد التطوير. نود أن نسمع رأيك.
body.ja:
誓いを立てましょう：
目標生存期間を3泊か7泊から選んでください。

フィードバックを送る
サバイヴ・ザ・ストームはまだ開発中です。ご意見をお聞かせください。
body.pl:
Podejmij zobowiązanie:
Wybierz docelowy czas przetrwania wynoszący 3 lub 7 nocy.
Prześlij opinię:
Survive the Storm jest wciąż w fazie rozwoju. Chętnie poznamy twoje zdanie.
body.es-419:
Comprométete:
Selecciona un objetivo de supervivencia de 3 o 7 noches.
Envía tus comentarios:
Sobrevive a la tormenta aún está en desarrollo. Nos encantaría conocer tu opinión.
body.tr:
Söz verin:
Hedef hayatta kalma süresini 3 veya 7 gece olarak seçin.

Geri Bildirim Gönderin:
Fırtınada Hayatta Kal hala geliştirme aşamasındadır. Ne düşündüğünüzü duymak isteriz.

body.de: PVE-Modus, in dem du den Sturm kooperativ bekämpfst!
body.ru: Совместное сражение с Бурей!
body.ko:
배틀로얄을 플레이하려면 상단의 "배틀로얄" 버튼을 클릭하세요.

팀과 함께하는 PvE 모드, 폭풍과 싸우는 어드벤처!
body.en: Cooperative PvE storm-fighting adventure!
body.it: Avventura tempestosa cooperativa PvE!
body.fr: Une aventure en JcE coopératif pour combattre la tempête !
body.es: ¡Aventura cooperativa JcE de lucha contra la tormenta!
body.ar: Cooperative PvE storm-fighting adventure!
body.ja: PvE協力プレイでストームに立ち向かえ！
body.pl: Kooperacyjne zmagania PvE z burzą i pustakami!
body.es-419: ¡Aventura de lucha contra la tormenta en un JcE cooperativo!
body.tr: Diğer oyuncularla birlikte PvE fırtınayla savaşma macerası!

body.de:
Battle Royale, 100-Spieler-PvP.

Fortschritte im PvE haben keinen Einfluss auf Battle Royale.
body.ru:
PvP-режим на 100 игроков «Королевская битва».

Прогресс в кампании не затрагивает «Королевскую битву».
body.ko:
100명의 플레이어와 함께하는 PvP 모드, 배틀로얄.

PvE 모드의 진행 상황은 배틀로얄 플레이에 영향을 주지 않습니다.
body.en:
100 Player PvP Battle Royale.

PvE progress does not affect Battle Royale.
body.it:
Battaglia reale PvP a 100 giocatori.

I progressi in PvE non sono trasferiti nella Battaglia reale.
body.fr:
Un Battle Royale à 100 en JcJ.

La progression du mode JcE n'affecte pas Battle Royale.
body.es:
Battle Royale JcJ de 100 jugadores.

El progreso JcE no afecta a Battle Royale.
body.ar:
100 Player PvP Battle Royale.

PvE progress does not affect Battle Royale.
body.ja:
100人参加のPvPバトルロイヤル。

PvEモードの進行状況はバトルロイヤルに影響しません。
body.pl:
Battle Royale: PvP dla 100 graczy

Postępy w kampanii nie wpływają na grę w Battle Royale.
body.es-419:
Batalla campal JcJ de 100 jugadores.

El progreso de JcE no afecta Batalla campal.
body.tr: 100 Oyunculu PvP Battle Royale. PvE ilerlemesi Battle Royale'i etkilemez.

body.de:
Deine Insel. Deine Freunde. Deine Regeln. 

Entdecke neue Arten, Fortnite zu spielen. Zocke von der Community erstellte Spiele mit Freunden und erschaffe deine Trauminsel.
body.ru:
Ваш остров. Ваши друзья. Ваши правила. 

Пробуйте новые развлечения в Fortnite: играйте с друзьями в игры, созданные участниками сообщества, и стройте что угодно на собственном острове.
body.ko:
내가 만든 게임, 내가 세운 규칙, 이제 나만의 섬에서 즐긴다! 
포트나이트 게임을 완전히 새로운 방식으로 플레이해 보세요. 커뮤니티가 만든 게임을 친구들과 플레이해 보고, 여러분의 꿈의 섬을 만들어보세요.
body.en:
Your Island. Your Friends. Your Rules.

Discover new ways to play Fortnite, play community made games with friends and build your dream island.
body.it:
La tua isola. I tuoi amici. Le tue regole. 

Scopri nuovi modi per giocare a Fortnite, divertiti insieme ai tuoi amici con i giochi creati dalla community e costruisci la tua isola da sogno.
body.fr:
Votre île. Vos amis. Vos règles.

Jouez à Fortnite autrement, éclatez-vous entre amis dans les jeux créés par la communauté et construisez l'île de vos rêves.
body.es:
Vuestra isla. Vuestros amigos. Vuestras reglas. 

Descubre nuevas formas de jugar a Fortnite, participa con tus amigos en juegos diseñados por la comunidad y construye la isla de tus sueños.
body.ar:
Your Island. Your Friends. Your Rules.

Discover new ways to play Fortnite, play community made games with friends and build your dream island.
body.ja: コミュニティによって作られた島で遊んだり、夢に描いた自分に島を創り、フォートナイトの新しい楽しみ方を発掘しよう。
body.pl:
Twoja wyspa. Twoi znajomi. Twoje zasady. 

Poznajcie nowe sposoby na zabawę w Fortnite, zagrajcie ze znajomymi w gry stworzone przez innych graczy i zbudujcie wyspę swoich marzeń.
body.es-419:
Tu isla. Tus amigos. Tus reglas. 

Descubre nuevas maneras de jugar Fortnite: juega con tus amigos a juegos diseñados por la comunidad y construye la isla de tus sueños.
body.tr: Fortnite’ı oynamanın yepyeni yollarını keşfet, topluluğun yaptığı oyunlarda arkadaşlarınla eğlen ve hayalindeki adayı inşa et.

title.ja: 新機能が利用可能になりました！

body.de: Entdecken Sie die neuesten Verbesserungen und Funktionen auf Neodyme! Besuchen Sie unsere Website für weitere Details.
body.ru: Откройте для себя новейшие улучшения и функции Neodyme! Посетите наш веб-сайт для получения более подробной информации.
body.ko: Neodyme의 최신 개선 사항과 기능을 확인하세요! 자세한 내용은 웹사이트를 방문하세요.
body.en: Discover the latest improvements and features on Neodyme! Visit our website for more details.
body.it: Scopri i miglioramenti e le funzionalità più recenti su Neodyme! Visita il nostro sito web per maggiori dettagli.
body.fr: Découvrez les dernières améliorations et fonctionnalités sur Neodyme ! Visitez notre site web pour plus de détails.
body.es: ¡Descubre las últimas mejoras y características en Neodyme! Visita nuestro sitio web para más detalles.
body.ar: اكتشف أحدث التحسينات والميزات على Neodyme! قم بزيارة موقعنا لمزيد من التفاصيل.
body.ja: Neodymeの最新の改善と機能をご覧ください！詳細はウェブサイトをご覧ください。
body.pl: Odkryj najnowsze ulepszenia i funkcje Neodyme! Odwiedź naszą stronę internetową, aby uzyskać więcej informacji.
body.es-419: ¡Descubre las últimas mejoras y características en Neodyme! Visita nuestro sitio web para más detalles.
body.tr: Neodyme'daki en son iyileştirmeleri ve özellikleri keşfedin! Daha fazla ayrıntı için web sitemizi ziyaret edin.

Level up to unlock over 100 rewards including 1500 V-Bucks!. You can purchase the Battle Pass any time during the season for 950 V-Bucks and retroactively unlock any rewards up to your current level.

body.de: Wenn du den Battle Pass kaufst, erhältst du sofort zwei exklusive Outfits - Turk und Journey! Du kannst weitere exklusive Belohnungen verdienen, darunter Emotes, Outfits, Umhänge, Spitzhacken, Ladebildschirme und mehr. Du erhältst jedes Mal eine Belohnung, wenn du eine Stufe aufsteigst, und zum ersten Mal kannst du auch über Stufe 100 hinaus aufsteigen!
body.ru: Купив Battle Pass, вы сразу же получите два эксклюзивных наряда - Turk и Journey! Вы сможете заработать еще больше эксклюзивных наград, включая эмодзи, наряды, обмотки, кирки, загрузочные экраны и многое другое. Вы будете получать награду каждый раз, когда повысите свой уровень, и впервые вы сможете продолжать повышать уровень до 100-го!
body.ko: 배틀패스를 구매하면 즉시 터크와 여정 두 가지 한정 의상을 받을 수 있습니다! 감정 표현, 의상, 랩, 곡괭이, 로딩 화면 등 더 많은 독점 보상을 획득할 수 있습니다. 레벨을 올릴 때마다 보상을 받을 수 있으며, 처음으로 100레벨 이후에도 계속 레벨을 올릴 수 있습니다!
body.en: When you buy the Battle Pass, you’ll instantly receive two exclusive outfits - Turk and Journey! You can earn more exclusive rewards including Emotes, Outfits, Wraps, Pickaxes, Loading Screens and more. You’ll receive a reward each time you level up and for the first time, you can keep leveling up beyond level 100!
body.it: Acquistando il Battle Pass, riceverete immediatamente due outfit esclusivi: Turk e Journey! Potrete ottenere altre ricompense esclusive, tra cui emoticon, abiti, involucri, picconi, schermate di caricamento e altro ancora. Riceverai una ricompensa ogni volta che salirai di livello e per la prima volta potrai continuare a salire di livello oltre il livello 100!
body.fr: En achetant le Battle Pass, vous recevrez instantanément deux tenues exclusives : Turk et Journey ! Vous pouvez gagner d'autres récompenses exclusives, notamment des émoticônes, des tenues, des enveloppes, des pioches, des écrans de chargement et bien d'autres choses encore. Tu recevras une récompense à chaque fois que tu monteras de niveau et, pour la première fois, tu pourras continuer à monter de niveau au-delà du niveau 100 !
body.es: Al comprar el pase de batalla, recibirás al instante dos atuendos exclusivos: ¡Turk y Journey! Podrás ganar más recompensas exclusivas, como emblemas, atuendos, envoltorios, picos, pantallas de carga y mucho más. Recibirás una recompensa cada vez que subas de nivel y, por primera vez, ¡podrás seguir subiendo más allá del nivel 100!
body.ar: عندما تشتري تذكرة القتال، ستحصل على الفور على زيين حصريين - ترك ورحلة! يمكنك كسب المزيد من المكافآت الحصرية بما في ذلك العواطف والأزياء والأغطية والفؤوس وشاشات التحميل والمزيد. ستحصل على مكافأة في كل مرة ترتقي فيها إلى مستوى أعلى، وللمرة الأولى، يمكنك الاستمرار في الارتقاء إلى ما بعد المستوى 100!
body.ja: バトルパスを購入すると、即座に2つの限定衣装（タークとジャーニー）がもらえます！さらに、エモート、衣装、ラップ、つるはし、ローディング画面などの限定報酬を獲得できます。レベルアップするたびに報酬がもらえ、今回初めてレベル100を超えてもレベルアップし続けることができる！
body.pl: Kupując przepustkę bojową, natychmiast otrzymasz dwa ekskluzywne stroje - Turk i Journey! Możesz zdobyć więcej ekskluzywnych nagród, w tym emotki, stroje, okłady, kilofy, ekrany ładowania i nie tylko. Otrzymasz nagrodę za każdym razem, gdy awansujesz na wyższy poziom, a po raz pierwszy możesz awansować na wyższy poziom niż 100!
body.es-419: Al comprar el pase de batalla, recibirás al instante dos atuendos exclusivos: ¡Turk y Journey! Podrás ganar más recompensas exclusivas, como emblemas, atuendos, envoltorios, picos, pantallas de carga y mucho más. Recibirás una recompensa cada vez que subas de nivel y, por primera vez, ¡podrás seguir subiendo más allá del nivel 100!
body.tr: Savaş Bileti satın aldığınızda, anında iki özel kıyafet kazanacaksınız - Turk ve Journey! İfadeler, Kıyafetler, Sargılar, Kazmalar, Yükleme Ekranları ve daha fazlası dahil olmak üzere daha fazla özel ödül kazanabilirsiniz. Her seviye atladığınızda bir ödül alacaksınız ve ilk kez 100. seviyenin ötesinde seviye atlamaya devam edebileceksiniz!

body.de: Der Verlauf des Battle Passes wurde in dieser Saison komplett überarbeitet. Steigere deinen Battle Pass, indem du Herausforderungen abschließt und Medaillen im Spiel verdienst! Verdiene tägliche Medaillen und fülle deine Stempelkarte aus, um deine EP zu maximieren.
body.ru: В этом сезоне полностью переработана прогрессия Боевого пропуска. Продвигайте свой Боевой пропуск, выполняя задания и зарабатывая внутриигровые медали! Зарабатывайте ежедневные медали и заполняйте свою перфокарту, чтобы получить максимальное количество XP.
body.ko: 이번 시즌 배틀 패스 진행도가 완전히 개편되었습니다. 도전 과제를 완료하고 게임 내 메달을 획득하여 배틀 패스를 진행하세요! 매일 메달을 획득하고 펀치 카드를 채워 경험치를 극대화하세요.
body.en: Battle Pass progression has been entirely reworked this Season. Advance your Battle Pass by completing challenges and earning in-game Medals! Earn daily medals and fill out your punch card to maximize your XP.
body.it: La progressione del Pass Battaglia è stata interamente rielaborata in questa stagione. Fai avanzare il tuo Pass Battaglia completando le sfide e guadagnando medaglie di gioco! Guadagna medaglie giornaliere e compila la tua scheda per massimizzare i tuoi XP.
body.fr: La progression du Battle Pass a été entièrement revue cette saison. Faites progresser votre Battle Pass en relevant des défis et en gagnant des médailles dans le jeu ! Gagnez des médailles quotidiennes et remplissez votre carte de pointage pour maximiser votre XP.
body.es: La progresión del Pase de Batalla se ha rediseñado por completo esta temporada. Avanza en tu Pase de Batalla completando desafíos y ganando medallas en el juego. Gana medallas diarias y rellena tu tarjeta de puntos para maximizar tu XP.
body.ar: تمت إعادة صياغة تقدم تذكرة القتال بالكامل هذا الموسم. تقدم تذكرة القتال الخاصة بك عن طريق إكمال التحديات وكسب الميداليات داخل اللعبة! اربح ميداليات يومية واملأ بطاقتك المثقوبة لزيادة نقاط XP الخاصة بك.
body.ja: 今シーズンからバトルパスの進行が全面的に見直されました。チャレンジを完了し、ゲーム内のメダルを獲得することで、バトルパスを進めることができます！毎日メダルを獲得し、パンチカードに記入してXPを最大化しよう。
body.pl: W tym sezonie postępy w ramach przepustki bojowej zostały całkowicie zmienione. Rozwijaj swoją przepustkę bojową, wykonując wyzwania i zdobywając medale w grze! Zdobywaj codzienne medale i wypełniaj kartę ciosów, aby zmaksymalizować swoje PD.
body.es-419: La progresión del Pase de Batalla se ha rediseñado por completo esta temporada. Avanza en tu Pase de Batalla completando desafíos y ganando medallas en el juego. Gana medallas diarias y rellena tu tarjeta de puntos para maximizar tu XP.
body.tr: Savaş Bileti ilerlemesi bu Sezon tamamen yeniden düzenlendi. Mücadeleleri tamamlayarak ve oyun içi Madalyalar kazanarak Savaş Biletinizi ilerletin! Günlük madalyalar kazanın ve XP'nizi en üst düzeye çıkarmak için delikli kartınızı doldurun.

playlists.description:
Code BluDrive 

It's 2 vs 2 in a battle of champions, which duo will come out on top? 

At the beginning of each round, all players will be granted the same random kit. The duo that has the most wins after 5 rounds are completed will be crowned the victors! 

Created By: BluDrive

A solo queue, FFA simulation of the end-game scenario in Battle Royale with a quick moving zone. Randomized spawns and inventory items make each round unique. Stick around after the first game. there are multiple rounds in each session.  Zone Wars is a collection of games made by the community. The four maps included in this playlist are:  Desert created by JotaPeGame. Code: jotapegame Downhill River created by Enigma. Code: enigma Vortex created by Zeroyahero. Code: zeroyahero Colosseum created by Jesgran. Code: jesgran

A party queue, FFA simulation of the end-game scenario in Battle Royale with a quick moving zone. Randomized spawns and inventory items make each round unique. Stick around after the first game. there are multiple rounds in each session.  Zone Wars is a collection of games made by the community. The four maps included in this playlist are:  Desert created by JotaPeGame. Code: jotapegame Downhill River created by Enigma. Code: enigma Vortex created by Zeroyahero. Code: zeroyahero Colosseum created by Jesgran. Code: jesgran

Code jesgran Zone Wars - Arena  A party, FFA simulation of the end-game scenario in Battle Royale with a quick-moving zone. Eliminate the competition as you avoid the Storm. Randomized spawns and inventory items make each round unique. Stick around after the first game. There are multiple rounds in each session. Become the ultimate gladiator in this Colosseum style island. An open style island demands quick building. Created by Jesgran.

Code jotapegame Desert Zone Wars 4.1  

A solo, FFA simulation of the end-game scenario in Battle Royale with a quick-moving zone. Eliminate the competition as you avoid the Storm. Randomized spawns and inventory items make each round unique. Stick around after the first game. There are multiple rounds in each session.  

Make your way through a small desert town to the final circle. A diverse set of weapons and mobility allows for unique gameplay and lots of replayability.  

Created by JotaPeGame.

Code enigma S10 Enigmas Downhill River Zonewars X  A party, FFA simulation of the end-game scenario in Battle Royale with a quick-moving zone. Eliminate the competition as you avoid the Storm. Randomized spawns and inventory items make each round unique. Stick around after the first game. There are multiple rounds in each session.  Stay out of the storm as you move downhill through a river in this original style Zone Wars island. Community launch pads and a consistent Storm path allows for familiarity after a few rounds.  Created by Enigma.

Code zeroyahero Vortex Zone Wars A party, FFA simulation of the end-game scenario in Battle Royale with a quick-moving zone. Eliminate the competition as you avoid the Storm. Randomized spawns and inventory items make each round unique. Stick around after the first game. There are multiple rounds in each session.  This island puts a unique twist on the Zone Wars game with mountainous terrain to traverse. The elevation change from zone to zone can be quite drastic!  Created by Zeroyahero

Created by Team Evolve. Featured in the Fortnite World Cup Creative Finals.  Battle other squads to capture zones and score points! Any player can capture a zone and score points for your team. Use impulse grenades to blast other teams out of the capture zones. Players can now earn XP after each game and the top three teams will earn bonus XP.
This mode has the map, compass, storm timer and many other elements of the Heads Up Display turned off.

Created by NotNellaf & Tollmolia in collaboration with Jordan Brand. 

Show off your moves in the Downtown Drop LTM. Launch off massive jumps, grind down city streets and collect coins to win! 

Prove you deserve the title of G.O.A.T.

moreInfoGroups.body:
Complete Festival Quests to gain Festival Points. Claim rewards as each section of the track is filled. 


Purchase the Premium Reward Track at any time during the event for 1,800 V-Bucks. You'll automatically claim the rewards you've earned up to that point.

Please note that all in-game rewards are not exclusive to Opening Night and may be available later in the Item Shop for purchase at a potentially higher price.

If you’ve purchased the Premium Reward Track, you’ll then have the option to buy rewards from both tracks simultaneously!

The “Buy Rewards” button appears at the bottom of the screen after you purchase the Premium Reward Track, and from there you can choose how many rewards you would like to buy.

eventScreens.starterHeader: Complete quests to earn Festival Points!
eventScreens.moreInfoSubHeader: OPENING NIGHT runs through February 22nd, 2024 at 10:00pm ET
purchasePremiumTrackBodyList: Instantly claim the Rift Rock Aura
Access the bottom reward track and earn more rewards
If you've earned Festival Points before purchasing the Premium Reward Track, you'll automaticaly claim the upgraded rewards you've earned up to that point.
Premium Reward Track items may be available in the Item Shop at a later date.

moreInfoGroups.body:
MOST WANTED is a set of challenges that allow you to increase your <text color="F7FF19">INFAMY</> and earn COLD BLOODED MEDALLIONS.

Completing MOST WANTED quests will grant you INFAMY, and will advance you along the reward track, unlocking cosmetic in-game rewards at certain intervals.

The <text color="F7FF19">MOST WANTED</> quests will unlock the SOLID SKULL Back Bling when you collect all <text color="F7FF19">COLD BLOODED MEDALLIONS</>!

Please note that in-game rewards, including the SOLID SKULL Back Bling, are not exclusive to MOST WANTED and may be available later in the Item Shop for purchase at a potentially higher price.

eventScreens.completionHeader: YOU PULLED OFF THE ULTIMATE HEIST... NOW SOLID SKULL AWAITS!
eventScreens.eventDescription: The MOST WANTED need your help to pull off heists targeting the COLD BLOODED's loot! Complete Most Wanted quests to unlock INFAMY rewards and earn COLD BLOODED MEDALLIONS!
eventScreens.purchaseLegal: All Most Wanted rewards can be obtained for free by completing quests. Buying rewards is optional.

eventScreens.eventCTA: Collect <text color="FCE104FF">Dragon Balls</> to unlock the Shenron glider!

moreInfoGroups.body:
Dragon Ball - Power Unleashed! is a set of challenges that allow you to increase your Power Level and earn Dragon Balls.

Completing quests will grant you Power Level and will advance you along the item track, unlocking cosmetic in-game rewards at certain intervals.

Complete three quests from each category to earn Dragon Balls, and unlock the Shenron Glider when you collect all seven!

All Power Unleashed rewards can be obtained without purchase by completing quests. Buying rewards is optional.

eventScreens.starterHeader: Complete Quests to Increase Power Level!
eventScreens.completionHeader: CONGRATULATIONS! YOUR POWER LEVEL TRAINING IS COMPLETE!
eventScreens.eventDescription:
Complete quests to increase your <text color="FCE104FF">Power Level</> and earn <text color="FCE104FF">Dragon Balls</> to unlock various in-game rewards.

Collect all 7 Dragon Balls to unlock the <text color="FCE104FF">Shenron Glider</>!

All Power Unleashed rewards can be obtained without purchase.
eventScreens.moreInfoLegal: Please note that in-game rewards, including the Shenron Glider, are not exclusive to Dragon Ball - Power Unleashed! and may be available later in the Item Shop for purchase at a potentially higher price.
eventScreens.purchaseLegal: All Power Unleashed rewards can be obtained without purchase by completing quests. Buying rewards is optional.
